sense.def:
Relief
je občutek veselja, ker se nekaj neprijetnega ni zgodilo ali se je končalo.

seg.quote: I breathed a sigh of relief.
To my relief, he found the suggestion acceptable.
It was such a relief to be free of disguises and pretence.

sense.def:
Relief
so tudi denar, hrana ali oblačila, ki jih razdelimo zelo revnim ali lačnim.

seg.quote: She outlined what was being done to provide relief.
